attributes.action: remove the inefficient executives and managers and management layers within the NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As our health services and hospitals are continually being eroded and reduced in the name of managerial efficiency, to the degree that there regularly "no beds" or queues at A&E, I call upon the PM to initiate measures to remove failing managements who are unable to provide the required customer service.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
